title: Physics and Chemistry of Micro-Nanotribology - J. Luo et al.
description:
Physics and Chemistry of Micro-Nanotribology - J. Luo et al. (ASTM International, 2008).pdf

This new ASTM monograph presents the principles and applications of tribology in micro- nano-scale and discusses some of the challenges faced by tribilogists since the development of new manufacturing techniques for electronic products. It covers a broad range of topics on micro-nanotribology, with emphasis on the physical and chemical aspects and on bridging fundamental studies and applications.
Topics include:
â€¢ Experimental methods and measure techniques
â€¢ Fluid film lubrication
â€¢ Molecular film lubrication
â€¢ Gas lubrication in nano-gap
â€¢ Mixed lubrication in nano-scale
â€¢ Applications of tribology in magnetic record systems
â€¢ Chemical mechanical polishing of ultra-smooth surfaces

This is a valuable resource for tribologists, mechanical engineers, lubrication engineers, and material scientist and engineers
